title: Project Skins *spoiler alert*
body: I like that the project skins will be on sale the second week except the fact that yi isnt. I will buy the yi skin but cant u make it like 1350 instead of 1850 or 1500 or something.But no matter what i will buy it except that i will rate riots fair paying system way lower.

replies.body:
Hey Lionbrine,

Legendary skins are never on sale when they're first released, which is why PROJECT: Yi won't be discounted at launch.

September 8th is the release date. 

If your purchase the skin between 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT (week one), you'll receive the First Strike loading screen card. 

Skins will then be turned off in the store until September 17th. On September 17th, (week two) content will be brought back to the store, and the four 1350 RP skins will be discounted to 975 RP, but you will not receive the First Strike loading screen card. This sale will end at the end of September 24th, and then the skins will return to full price.

What if you get gifted a Project skin during the first week? Do you get the First Strike, or do you have to buy it yourself? Also, does buying Project Yasuo during the week count to get the First Strike card, or does it have to be one of the new ones??
If you're gifted PROJECT: Zed, Yi, Lucian, Fiora or Leona during the first week, you will receive the loading screen card. PROJECT: Yasuo is not included in this promotion.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Qt4m6lto,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-31T23:32:20.843+0000)
>
> September 8th is the release date. 
> 
> If your purchase the skin between 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT (week one), you'll receive the First Strike loading screen card. 
> 
> Skins will then be turned off in the store until September 17th. On September 17th, (week two) content will be brought back to the store, and the four 1350 RP skins will be discounted to 975 RP, but you will not receive the First Strike loading screen card. This sale will end at the end of September 24th, and then the skins will return to full price.

Just a suggestion which I'm sure yall already have in mind. Since the 1350 rp skins will go on sale the second week they are out, can you add some sort of clarity when releasing the skins so that people will know that the skins will be going on sale? Usually we see skins on sale the initial week and then go back to full price after. I know that the company needs to make money and that is good because I love this game, but I could see that people might get mad about buying them the first week when they are out only to realize that they are on sale the second week?
We currently have a PBE post explaining the dates and additional information. Once the content goes live, we'll have supporting messaging as well. ^-^

Will the First Strike editions be full price for the first week of them being out or will they also be 975 for a couple days for the 1350s? I understand Yis will be 1820 since its legendary and those dont get discounted basically ever.
First week will be 1350 RP, second week will be 975 RP.
Will Riot Skins ever come back to the store for purchase?

one thing sadness me is that for Yi being a legendary skin still gets the exact same treatment as the others :/ ... 
the idea of the borders is to prompt buying the skin at full price at launch (which i have no problem with) but for Yi it's full price anytime so it feels weird ..
also being a legendary skin; getting two points (for skinned minions) as the others ... would have been more profitable to make it 3 (promoting to buy a ward for a total of 4 point = one player can get the minions alone) = profit ^^ ?
idk just my thoughts :D
anyway wanted to thank you for being so interactive with the community ^^

I CAN'T WAIT THAT LONG

I NEED THAT LIMITED EDITION ZED BORDER

KATEY HOLD ME Q.Q
Will there be a bundle for the skins?

I like the Project leona skin and its great that I can buy it soon! However, I like also the Defender leona skin, though it appears unavailable to buy. Will it be available again, or one just can't buy it anymore?
Thank you rioters for informing me i will end up buying the 1st strike yi loading screen thingy. :D so glad i could get this help and not feel cheated :D
So when will they come out?
